name: Blackbox (itch) (SolidJuho)
description:
Controls: Use Arrow keys to move Right and left, use up and down arrow to choose item in inventory and use X to interact and select items in inventory. You can also use right key to change page on book or select items on inventory.

Forest area is pretty long run, so you just need to walk until you get to tower.

Blackbox is puzzle horror game made by a small dev team of:

Kayvan - Game design and coding.

Wubsum - Pixel art and story.

SolidJuho - Level Designing and marketing.

JackQuinton - Music.

WubsFromSpace - Sound Designer.

The current version of the game is Public Alpha version, which is made to get feedback from players, so we can development game even better and greater.

Music, sounds are going to be implemented, but this is pure gameplay versio.

If you get any errors with game eg. Crashes, antivirus warnings. Please provide us Error, Your OS, Antivirus Software name.
